articles.author: Brianna Williams
articles.title: 'So, you're Patrick Mahomes?' - Cowboys CB Trevon Diggs' son had a funny way of greeting Dak Prescott - ESPN
articles.description: When the Cowboys quarterback walked through the door, Diggs' son seemed to be under the impression that Prescott was the signal-caller for the Kansas City Chiefs.
articles.content:
The final episode of HBO's 2021 season of "Hard Knocks" featured a particularly precious moment.

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Animals are 'shape shifting' in response to climate change - CNN
articles.description: Some warm-blooded animals are experiencing shifts in their body shapes, likely as a response to the pressures of climate change, according to a new review of existing research.
articles.content:
